definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
Timon of Athens, 1607 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]

sentences.english: It won two silver and one bronze medals in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 在雅典該國獲得了兩枚銀牌和一枚銅牌。

sentences.english: His greatest works are the School of Athens and the Sistine Madonna.
sentences.chinese: 他最偉大的作品是《雅典學院》和《西斯廷聖母像》。

sentences.english: A: China did very well in the last Olympics in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 中國在上屆雅典奧運會上取得了優異的成績。

sentences.english: There were street clashes in Athens last week. Little wonder.
sentences.chinese: 上週雅典有街頭衝突，小奇蹟。

sentences.english: Betty is going to put up at the Anello Hotel on the third day of her trip to Athens .
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂在她到雅典旅行的第三天，要住宿在安妮羅飯店。

sentences.english: After the 9th national games, the Chinese gymnastics team will prepare for the Athen Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 九運會後，中國體操隊將進入雅典奧運會備戰期。

sentences.english: One man, Heracles of Athens emerged as its undisputed leader.
sentences.chinese: 一個名叫赫拉克利斯的人衆望所歸成爲雅典領袖。

sentences.english: Here is the "making of" taken in Athens and Santorini.
sentences.chinese: 這是於雅典及聖托里尼拍照時的花絮。

sentences.english: Athena was the goddess of wisdom and patroness of house holdarts.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜是智慧女神和家居藝術品的守護女神。

sentences.english: The first stop on most excursions is the Parthenon on the hill of the Acropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數遊覽的第一站是在雅典衛城帕特農神廟山。

sentences.english: Athene is the goddess of wisdom.
And Liuxiang won a gold medal in the Athens 2004 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 還有劉翔雅典奧運會勇奪金牌那一刻。

sentences.english: We flew to Athens via Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘飛機經巴黎去雅典。

sentences.english: Your Evil side wishes to dominate Sanctuary and Kill Athena.
sentences.chinese: 你的邪惡面希望殺掉雅典娜，統治聖域。

sentences.english: Yao carried the flag four yours ago in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 他曽在四年前的雅典擔任過旗手。

definition: Thebes, place name in ancient Egypt/Thebes, ancient Greek city state
